carousel.title: 17” Cinematic Display
carousel.description: With 2200x1300 resolution, ultra bright, true colors and exceptional responsiveness, the new center display is the best screen to watch anywhere.

carousel.title: Focus on Driving
carousel.description: The ultimate focus on driving: no stalks, no shifting. Model S is the best car to drive, and the best car to be driven in.

carousel.title: Perfect Environment
carousel.description: Clean, powerful yet invisible cabin conditioning. Tri-zone temperature controls, ventilated front seats and HEPA filtration come standard.

carousel.title: Redesigned Second Row
carousel.description: Seating for three adults, with extra legroom, headroom and a stowable armrest with integrated storage and wireless charging.

grid.title: Game from Anywhere
grid.description: Up to 10 teraflops of processing power enables in-car gaming on-par with today’s newest consoles. Wireless controller compatibility lets you game from any seat.

grid.title: Stay Connected
grid.description: Multi-device Bluetooth, wireless and USB-C charging for every passenger, with enough power to fast-charge your tablets and laptop.

grid.title: Your Best Audio System
grid.description: A 22-speaker, 960-watt audio system with active noise canceling offers the best listening experience at home or on the road.

grid.title: Real Storage
grid.description: With front and rear trunks and fold-flat seats, Model S is a luxury car where you can fit your bike without taking the wheel off, and your luggage too.

performanceSection.title: Beyond Ludicrous
performanceSection.description: With the longest range and quickest acceleration of any electric vehicle in production, Model S Plaid is the highest performing sedan ever built. Both Long Range and Plaid powertrains, with updated battery architecture, are capable of back-to-back, consistent 1/4 mile runs.

designSection.title: Designed of Efficiency
designSection.description: With the lowest drag coefficient on Earth and unmatched efficiency, Model S is built for speed and range. Together with a wider body and chassis, these elements help you go down the straight or around corners quicker than ever.

rangeSection.title: Go Anywhere
rangeSection.description: Travel farther on a single charge than any other electric vehicle—and keep going with access to 25,000+ Superchargers globally. By combining up to 405 miles of estimated range with Tesla fast charging technology, you’ll spend less time charging and even more time on the road.

stats.title: 405mi
stats.description: Go anywhere with up to 405 miles of estimated range on a single charge

stats.title: 200mi
stats.description: Supercharge up to 200 miles in 15 minute

title: Solar Panels
description: Lowest Cost Solar Panels in America

title: Solar Roof
description: Produce Clean Energy From Your Roof
